item.title: Reserve 2 and 3 Fuel Transfer Valves – Converted Freighter

numlitem.para: Reserve tanks 2 and 3 remain empty, and
Maximum Takeoff Weight is limited to 740,000 lbs. (335,664 kg)

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: CWT fuel included as part of ZFW may be used en route.
Reserve tanks 2 and 3 must remain empty.
All tanks (except reserve tanks 2 and 3) may be fueled to capacity, provided takeoff weight does not exceed 740,000 lbs.
Center wing tank (CWT) fuel must be included as part of the ZFW but may be used en route.

placard.para: Install Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel: "RESERVE #2 AND #3 RESERVE TRANSFER VALVES INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
